site_name: Pavement Outside Post Office150 High StreetNew MaldenKT3 4ER

constraints_details.constraints_layer_description: AIRCZ Type: AIRPORTDescription: Gatwick Airport Wind Turbine Consultation Zone:Contact: The Safeguarding Department, Gatwick Airport Limited, 7th Floor Destinations Place, London Gatwick Airport, West Sussex, RH06 0NP

description: Removal of BT kiosk(s) and replacement with 1no. new InLink structure offering free Wi-Fi and incorporating 2no. digital 55 inc. LCD adverts.
decision_conditions: The proposed development by virtue of its size and siting would result in a visually intrusive and incongruous addition to the streetscene that would compete with existing street furniture and signage creating street clutter and detract from the character and appearance of the area. The proposal would not accord with policies CS8 and DM10 of the Council's adopted LDF Core Strategy April 2012.
Please provide photos and a plan or sketch showing the location of the trees within the site or immediately adjoining the site.

Inspection:Site inspection carried out as a desktop exercise with information provided by the applicant as supporting material to application.Assessment:Appropriate repeat works to maintain crown volume at size appropriate to adjacent properties.Recommendation:Approve.
